descriptionHtml:
Spherical moons are so boring...  why not liven up the night sky with a bit of lunar destruction!

Its just the .dds texture files for the moon so drop the texture folder in there and away you go.

no fuss, no muss.

Also no phases as yet; once I figure those out, i\'ll upload something.  :p

EDIT: this is my first mod/upload so if I need to add/remove anything or i\'ve missed something out, please let me know and i\'ll fix it immediately.
author: Darksider
